item.title: Biography
item.description: Professional Background Jeffrey A. Zyjeski brings a unique perspective to speculative fiction through his extensive background in law, government relations, and contemplative practice. With a Juris Doctor from the University of Connecticut School of Law, he has spent over 25 years navigating the complex intersections of legal frameworks, corporate interests, and governmental policy. His professional experience spans multiple sectors, providing him with deep insights into how institutional power operates and how technological innovation intersects with regulatory and ethical considerations.
